dict.acceptation: 煮沸，沸腾；疔，疖子；[医]疡肿，脓肿；

sent.orig: How much oil boil can gun boil boil if gun boil can boil oil?
sent.trans: 如果橡胶罐能够把油煮开的话，它可以煮开多少油泥？

sent.orig: How much oil boil can a gum boil boil if a gum boil can boil oil?
sent.trans: 多少石油煮沸才能口香糖煮沸，煮沸，如果胶，可以煮沸，煮沸石油？

sent.orig: Please boil me an egg/boil an egg for me.
Boil chicken time, same, the chicken breast cooked, chicken thigh, boil not.
sent.trans: 煮鸡时间，同样，鸡胸肉煮熟了，鸡大腿，就煮不。

sent.orig: Boil water. Put crabsticks in and boil for 5 minutes, take out and set aside.
sent.trans: 把水煲滚，放入蟹柳段，略煮约5分钟，盛起。
